containers.title: CozyHome
containers.subtitle: Mint One
containers.slogan: This CozyHome is one of the 7,777 residences On the land of legends of Ethereum blockchain. On 1th of Sep 04:00PM EST, 5555 CozyHome will be available to mint for 0.03ETH

containers.title: The Roadmap
containers.subtitle: Home is Homes
containers.slogan: Every home owner gets access to private land of Etherium with Cozy Homes. We are going to start the consturction!

pictures.title: %0: BUILD HOME. WELCOME TO LAND OF LEGENDS.
pictures.subtitle: The private properties are open!
pictures.description: The Private DISCORD CHANNEL will be opened to HOME OWNERS.

pictures.title: %20: The Community Wallet is opened.
pictures.subtitle: We opened a first store in Land of Legends, goods are free to Home Owners!
pictures.description: Order your free t-shirt with our logo and slogan 'Home Is Home'

pictures.title: %40: ROARwards Program Lunch with Type-II!
pictures.description: Every month, CozyHomies will receive their share of 8% of royalties in a unique ROARwards Program that rewards community engagement.

pictures.title: %60: Special home follow up will be released as Type-II
pictures.description: Type-II 2222 owner will be add-up to community (Type-II owners gets 4%)

pictures.title: %80: New NFT Type-III
pictures.subtitle: Luxry home follow up will be released as Type-III
pictures.description: Type-III 1111 owner will be add-up to community (Type-II owners gets 2%)
